body:
@amdass i was reading the spanish translation (not  here) and the sister loves romantically her brother before he rapes her. The brother has a twisted familiar love, and don't want to be alone and the sister saw the first rape as an oportunity to manipulate the brother to fuck and stay with her (She says her brother don't love her, he is terrified of being alone, but she really loves him as a man. So both are menhera in the begining.
Also the girl likes the rapey sex.

The guy rapes his little sister every time he sees her with another guy out of jealousy, and eventually she got addicted to the sex and threatens him she'll find other guys if he doesn't keep fucking her.
Can somebody explain me what it says?
